alert.note: Alert for Hughes; Lyman; Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 6:14PM MDT until July 18 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Stanley County in central South Dakota... South central Hughes County in central South Dakota... Northwestern Lyman County in central South Dakota... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 714 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Rousseau, or 15 miles southeast of Pierre, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cedar Creek Rec Area, Kennebec and Byre Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
